##Population Map of India
This page has been created as part of an assignment for Coursera's Developing Data Products course.
The map below has been created with Leaflet and shows the top tourist spots in New Delhi, India.

```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(knitr)
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lat=27.1750, lng=78.0422, popup="Taj Mahal, Agra, India") #%>%
  #setView (lat=28.6129, lng=77.2295, zoom=16) 
m

```
